House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01226
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REDEFINING THE CRIME OF GAME FIXING AND PRESCRIBING STIFFER PENALTIES THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : PINEDA, ENRICO A., ROMERO, MICHAEL ODYLON L.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-03
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2020-03-04
          -The body referred HB Nos. 1226 & 5281 to the Sub-Committee on Oversight chaired by Rep. Jericho Jonas B. Nograles. The Chairman directed the Committee Secretary to prepare a working draft, incorporating all the comments issues and suggestions raised by concerned agencies.
          -Initial deliberation
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
